explains: v. （用斧或刀）砍，剁；（用斧子等工具）砍伐（树木）；削（球）；取消；（大幅度地）削减；向下猛击；（非正式）反复无常（chop 的现在分词）

sentences.en: Visitors were set to work chopping wood.
sentences.cn: 参观者们被安排去砍木头。

sentences.en: He made a neat chopping motion with his hand.
sentences.cn: 他用手做了一个干净利落的砍的动作。

sentences.en: Young Geoffrey made money by chopping and selling firewood.
sentences.cn: 年轻的杰弗里靠砍柴卖柴挣钱。
